original_text: Every sickness also and every affliction that is not recorded in the book of this law, the Lord will bring upon you, until you are destroyed.
korean_text: 또 이 율법책에 기록하지 아니한 모든 질병과 모든 재앙을 네가 멸망하기까지 여호와께서 네게 내리실 것이니

sentences.original_text: Every sickness also and every affliction
that is not recorded in the book of this law
the Lord will bring upon you
